title: MENTAL SLAVERY
lyrics:
Ginseng[?]
Do you know how the problems you make and how more I can take, I mean
Days go, fall apart, then you break, nothing more I can say
I keep all these fucking problems in my brain
I keep saying to myself that I'm so lame

I don't really fucking know what I became

Tell these niggas stay the fuck outside my lane, ayy, ayy

Make it stop, we divided, can't find it, done hiding

Need guidance, I'm dying, oh baby I'm dying, no

I'm back inside the basement, my location

I promise that I wait for you 'cause I got patience

I just wanna know why you be fallin' for me

I left in the morning, now you callin' for me

I just want this fucking pussy bitch, I'm craving

I like where you put it on me, that's my favorite

That bitch got me felling like it's mental slavery

Still I'm fucking with you bitch, I got some bravery, done



For you I knew, I knew

Where you was hiding all along



She want me to save her, fuck all of my haters

I'm living too dangerous, my life is amazin'

I'm ballin', they nigga, they hatin'

She switch up on me 'cause I made it

They say what they seen when you famous

They don't see all the money I'm making

Who do you want from me, who do you want

You want alot of me, then tell me you wanna be god

Give me your honesty, haven't asked for a lot

Girl they been robbin' me, so I think it's better to stop



No, I never [?]

No, I never [?] for you

[?]
